item.title: Help with my Voule Auto Restarter?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

When I run it, it says tskill is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file underneath that it says Starting server on port: 43594. I still know its probably not running correctly though… any idea on how to fix this BEFORE THE JDK THING IS EVEN SUGGESTED LOOK AT THIS

@echo off
cls
tskill java /a
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title DavidScape 508
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe” DavidScape/Server 43594
cls

Thats what you see inside when I edit it. I have the latest java so… all help is appreciated.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with my Voule Auto Restarter?
